quote: I started my life with a single absolute: that the world was mine to shape in the image of my highest values and never to be given up to a lesser standard, no matter how long or hard the struggle.
quote_letters: I STARTED MY LIFE WITH A SINGLE ABSOLUTE THAT THE WORLD WAS MINE TO SHAPE IN THE IMAGE OF MY HIGHEST VALUES AND NEVER TO BE GIVEN UP TO A LESSER STANDARD NO MATTER HOW LONG OR HARD THE STRUGGLE
